metadata.title: CVE-2020-0444 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In audit_free_lsm_field of auditfilter.c, there is a possible bad kfree dueto a logic error in audit_data_to_entry. This could lead to localescalation of privilege with no additional execution privileges needed.User interaction is not needed for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions:Android kernelAndroid ID: A-150693166References: Upstream kernel

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'was needs-triage ESM criteria').
